About the Project

The DAKODA project focuses on building and exploring a learner corpus infrastructure with standardized formats (CAS) and annotated datasets across multiple corpora. This infrastructure supports advanced linguistic research and tool development.

Corpora Overview

A variety of corpora are integrated into the DAKODA infrastructure, representing different modalities, tasks, and learner types. For corpus-specific metadata and download options, visit the Repository.
